meanings.definition: A cloth or towel used for drying dishes.
meanings.sent1: I always make sure to have clean dishtowels ready for drying the dishes.
meanings.sent2: My mom bought new dishtowels with cute patterns for the kitchen.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat thought the dishtowels were toys and dragged them around the house.
meanings.sent4: The dishtowels hung on the line, fluttering like colorful flags in the breeze.
meanings.sent5: The soft texture of the dishtowels made them perfect for absorbing water quickly.

meanings.definition: Towels specifically designed for use in the kitchen for drying dishes.
meanings.sent1: The dishtowels matched the kitchen decor perfectly.
meanings.sent2: She stacked the clean dishtowels neatly in the drawer after doing the dishes.
meanings.sent3: The dishtowels formed a cozy nest for the kitchen utensils.
meanings.sent4: The bright colors of the dishtowels added a cheerful touch to the kitchen.
meanings.sent5: Using high-quality dishtowels can make dishwashing a more pleasant task.
